title: Khleb - imya sushchestvitelnoe
actors: Nikolai Voloshin, Andrey Dudarenko, Sergey Nikonenko, Nina Ruslanova, Natalya Sayko, Aleksey Buldakov, Kirill Lavrov, Petr Shelokhonov, Yuri Votyakov, Aleksey Zaytsev, Nikolay Mikheev, Aleksandr Bashirov, Mikhail Alekseyev, Leonid Mitnik, Vladlen Biryukov
description: Epic film about life of three generations in central Russia on the Volga river.
